description.value:
This is a collection of in-home entertainment, that includes a television, vidcons, connections to the infosphere, sound systems and all that is necessary to enjoy comfortable living in a home.

An entertainment setup allows you to connect to the Infosphere and make any necessary Computer checks from your home. It also includes in-home entertainment to allow you to listen to any music or watch any movies you possess.

An improved entertainment system includes latest devices and improved infosphere services, for a greater experience. Whether its the latest next-gen vidcon, the sharpest looking television and monitors, max-speed infosphere connections, this setup has it all!

You gain a +1 item bonus to all Computer or Infosphere-related checks, which includes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie}, and more via the infosphere, or a +1 circumstance bonus if you already have an item bonus, while you use your entertainment suite.
